channel.title: CVE Feed for Ari Susanto -- easy-popup-show
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ari Susanto -- easy-popup-show

item.title: CVE-2024-29009|2024-03-25T04:14:37.123Z -- Ari Susanto -- easy-popup-show
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in easy-popup-show all versions allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of the administrator and to perform unintended operations if the administrator views a malicious page while logged in.
